metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27787 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A Segmentaation fault was found in UPX in invert_pt_dynamic() function in p_lx_elf.cpp. An attacker with a crafted input file allows invalid memory address access that could lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
